Interface IPretriNet

All Known Implementing Classes:
PetriNet
public interface IPretriNet
Defines the contract for a Petri net simulation.

This interface specifies all necessary methods for managing and simulating the behavior of a Petri net, including manipulation of places, transitions, and edges.

  • Method Details

    • stepSimulation

      void stepSimulation(Transition transition)
      Executes one simulation step for the specified Transition.
      Parameters:
      transition - the transition to activate during the simulation step.

    • addPlace

      void addPlace(int nbTokens)
      Adds a new Place to the Petri net with a specified number of tokens.
      Parameters:
      nbTokens - the initial number of tokens to assign to the place.

    • addEdge

      void addEdge(int weight, Place origin, Transition arrival)
      Adds a new incoming Edge from a Place to a Transition.
      Parameters:
      weight - the weight of the edge (number of tokens transferred).
      origin - the origin place.
      arrival - the arrival transition.

    • addEdge

      void addEdge(int weight, Transition origin, Place arrival)
      Adds a new outgoing Edge from a Transition to a Place.
      Parameters:
      weight - the weight of the edge (number of tokens transferred).
      origin - the origin transition.
      arrival - the arrival place.

    • addTransition

      void addTransition()
      Adds a new Transition to the Petri net.

    • removePlace

      void removePlace(Place place)
      Removes a Place from the Petri net.
      Parameters:
      place - the place to remove.

    • removeEdge

      void removeEdge(Edge edge)
      Removes an Edge from the Petri net.
      Parameters:
      edge - the edge to remove.

    • removeTransition

      void removeTransition(Transition transition)
      Removes a Transition from the Petri net.
      Parameters:
      transition - the transition to remove.

    • setTokens

      void setTokens(Place place, int nbTokens)
      Sets the number of tokens in a specific Place.
      Parameters:
      place - the place whose tokens will be updated.
      nbTokens - the new number of tokens to assign.

    • setWeight

      void setWeight(Edge edge, int weight)
      Sets the weight of a specific Edge.
      Parameters:
      edge - the edge whose weight will be updated.
      weight - the new weight to assign.

    • drawable

      List<Transition> drawable()
      Returns the list of Transitions that can currently fire.
      Returns:
      a list of firable transitions.

    • launchSimulation

      void launchSimulation(int steps)
      Launches the Petri net simulation for a given number of steps.
      Parameters:
      steps - the number of simulation steps to execute.
